heading.duplicateIdentity: You have joined the meeting from another device

videoinput.label: Camera
videoinput.placeholder: Enable camera to see the preview

join.heading: Join the meeting?
join.cameraNotGranted: Would you like others to be able to see you during the meeting?
join.cameraAndMicNotGranted: Would you like others to be able to see and hear you during the meeting?

permissionsButton.cameraAndMicNotGranted: Allow access to camera and microphone

waiting.title: Requesting to join...
waiting.body: You will be able to join this call when someone authorizes you

denied.title: You cannot join this call
denied.body: Your request to join has been denied.

timeoutInvite.title: You cannot join this call
timeoutInvite.body: No one responded to your request

leaveRoomPrompt: This will make you leave the meeting.

shareDialog.heading: Your meeting is ready
shareDialog.description: Share this link with people you want to invite to the meeting.
shareDialog.permissions: People with this link do not need your permission to join this meeting.

body.audioinput: Your microphone is already in use by another tab or application, which prevents it from being activated in this video call. If you wish, close the other tab or application to use it here.
body.videoinput: Your camera is already in use by another tab or application, which prevents it from being activated in this video call. If you wish, close the other tab or application to use it here.

heading.camera: {{appTitle}} is not allowed to use your camera
heading.microphone: {{appTitle}} is not allowed to use your microphone
heading.cameraAndMicrophone: {{appTitle}} is not allowed to use your microphone or camera
heading.default: {{appTitle}} is not allowed to use certain permissions

openMenu.others: Click on the settings icon ICON_PLACEHOLDER in your browser’s address bar
openMenu.safari: Click the 'Safari' menu, and open 'Settings for {{appDomain}}'.

details.cameraAndMicrophone: Allow access to the camera and microphone

createRoom.heading: Authentication Required
createRoom.body: This room has not been created yet. Please authenticate to create it or wait for an authenticated user to do so.

screenShare.title: Unable to share your screen
screenShare.message: Your browser may not be allowed to record the screen on your computer.

effects.activateCamera: Your camera is disabled. Choose an option to enable it.
effects.notAvailable: Video effects will be available soon on your browser. We're working on it! In the meantime, you can use Google Chrome for best performance or Firefox :(
effects.heading: Blur

chat.disclaimer: The messages are visible to participants only at the time they are sent. All messages are deleted at the end of the call.

moreTools.body: Access more tools to enhance your meetings.

transcript.title: Transcription
transcript.body: Keep a written record of your meeting.

screenRecording.title: Recording
screenRecording.body: Record your meeting to watch it again whenever you like.

button.ariaLabel: Copy the information from your meeting

start.heading: Transcribe this call
start.body: Automatically transcribe this call and receive the summary in Docs.

notAdminOrOwner.heading: Restricted Access
notAdminOrOwner.body: For security reasons, only the meeting creator or an admin can start a transcription (beta).

stop.heading: Transcription in progress...
stop.body: The transcription of your meeting is in progress. You will receive the result by email once the meeting is finished.

stopping.heading: Saving your data…
stopping.body: You can leave the meeting if you wish; the recording will finish automatically.

beta.heading: Become a beta tester
beta.body: Record your meeting for later. You will receive a summary by email once the meeting is finished.

body.stop: We were unable to stop the transcription. Please try again in a moment.
body.start: We were unable to start the transcription. Please try again in a moment.

start.heading: Record this call
start.body: Record this call to watch it later and receive the video recording by email.

notAdminOrOwner.heading: Restricted Access
notAdminOrOwner.body: For security reasons, only the meeting creator or an admin can start a recording (beta).

stopping.heading: Saving your data…
stopping.body: You can leave the meeting if you wish; the recording will finish automatically.

stop.heading: Recording in progress…
stop.body: You will receive the result by email once the recording is complete.

body.stop: We were unable to stop the recording. Please try again in a moment.
body.start: We were unable to start the recording. Please try again in a moment.

admin.description: These organizer settings allow you to maintain control of your meeting. Only organizers can access these controls.

access.title: Room access
access.description: These settings will also apply to future occurrences of this meeting.

public.label: Open
public.description: No one needs to request to join the meeting.

trusted.label: Open to trusted people
trusted.description: Authenticated people do not need to request to join the meeting.

restricted.label: Restricted
restricted.description: People who have not been invited to the meeting must request to join.

rating.question: What do you think about the quality of your call?

openFeedback.question: What can we do to improve ourselves?
openFeedback.placeholder: Describe your bugs or share your suggestions…

confirmationMessage.heading: Thank you for your submission
confirmationMessage.body: Our product team takes the time to carefully review your feedback. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

muteParticipantAlert.heading: Mute {{name}}
muteParticipantAlert.description: Mute {{name}} for all participants? {{name}} will be the only one who can unmute themselves.

limitReachedAlert.title: Recording limit exceeded
limitReachedAlert.description: The recording has exceeded the maximum allowed duration{{duration_message}}. It will now be saved automatically.

fullScreenWarning.message: To avoid infinite loop display, do not share your entire screen. Instead, share a tab or another window.
